column2: an A.M. Eatery////There is one thing I forgot to mention - The first time we went
column3: I slipped as I was walking to the ladies' room
column4: but I figured it was a fluke. However
column6: and the same thing happened. I was wearing tennis shoes the first time and hiking boots the second so it was definitely the floor. I'm pregnant so it's especially worrisome. This is my *only* complaint.
